content: [bolverk] "And if I just leave it in the woods somewhere?"
[bolverk] "Fine. The Ravens' Oath: it'll be done."
[bolverk] "If they make it across that chasm, it'll be war. War's always been good for business."
[bolverk] "I won't fall for that stupid fire trick again!"
[bolverk juno] "Get on with it!"
[bolverk] "Now we have a job."
[bolverk] "Since when has that stopped you?"
[bolverk] "They're across that damn chasm! That job is done."
[bolverk] "Think it was stupid of me to challenge Hakon?"
[bolverk] "Valka secrets."
[bolverk] "We make it to Bindal, get a job, and things get back to normal. We always survive."
[bolverk] "What do you want?"
/=You glare at the clansmen and varl settled among the ruins of Ormsdalr and feel the rumbling growl in your chest.=/
/=You growl, but she's right.=/
/=You grunt in disgust.=/
[folka] "And what about all those dredge?"
[folka] "And your way just landed us on our asses."
[folka bolverk] "Not really my place to say."
[folka] "Everyone'll be ready to leave as soon as you start walking north."
/=Folka ignores your comment.=/
[folka] "Haven't you said enough?"
[folka] "Haven't you said enough?"

content.option: "What's to keep me from gutting you right here?"

content: [folka] "I'll finish packing."
[folka] "Now what?"
/=Folka's eyebrows rise at the sound of work.=/
/=Folka smirks but her face hardens as Juno approaches.=/
[folka] "That waterfall surprised us all. Of course, it'll be nice to be on our own again."
[folka] "The new members from the other caravan will probably need a beating or two--"
/=The shieldmaiden grins.=/
[folka] "We could've at least waited to hear their plans first, then decided."
[folka] "We could've at least waited to hear their plans first, then decided."

content.option: "Their plans almost took us over a faen waterfall."
"I decided we'll find work in Bindal."

content: [folka] "We could've done that without you butting heads with the leader of the remaining varl."
[folka] "Well, I won't. I'll finish the packing."
[juno] "Agreed, but the cart you've been hauling has become too troublesome. It needs to be sunk in the deepest waters around."
[juno] "A job opportunity that only I can offer."
[juno] "Bolverk, could I have a word with you?"
[juno bolverk] "You would turn down the Mender Council's coin?"

content.option: "Is this some kind of pity offer, weaver?"

content: [juno] "If you needed to know, I would've told you."
[juno] "I know your Ravens need work. Without work and coin, that banner of yours is worthless."
[juno] "In Boersgard, we made an arrangement for you to protect this large cart until we were away from the dredge threat."
[juno] "I will know, as will the other Valka. Besides, the Ravens always finish their jobs. That reputation means everything to you."
/=Juno looks both calm and perturbed simultaneously. She stares at Folka for an extended moment before the shieldmaiden turns to leave.=/
/=Juno nods and walks away. Folka watches her leave and returns to your side.=/
[juno] "Payment upon completion - you have a Valka's oath. The Blue River to the northwest will be your best option."
[juno] "She's protective of you."
[juno] "Suffice it to say you have a Valka's oath for a great deal of coin once you have sunk that cart. The Blue River northwest of Bindal is my suggestion."
/=The two of you watch Folka stomp off, but not too far.=/
[juno] "Think what you want, but if you're headed to Bindal, the Blue River isn't much further. Valka's oath: you'll be paid well upon completion."
[juno] "You would turn down the mender Council's coin?"
{skip} mark1=bolverk mark2=folka mark4=juno
/=You step towards her, towering above the tall Valka, though she stands resolute.=/
